Reference

All functions

abund_rel()

Calculate relative abundance

abund_rel_vec()

Calculate relative abundance

add_trans()

Add transparency to a color

calc_z()

Degree of compensation

ce()

Calculate normalized sustainable yield

dat

Life history parameters for pinnipeds

dynamics()

Generate one marine mammal population trajectory

find_msyr()

calculate MSYR

get_diff()

Calculate the derivative of C in getMNPL()

get_dz()

Derivative of z (function to minimize)

get_f()

Get bycatch mortality rate given depletion

get_mnpl()

Calculate Maximum Net Productivity Level (MNPL)

get_rf()

Get relative recruitment at bycatch mortality rate E

getfecmax()

Calculate maximum theoretical fecundity rate

ggradar()

Radar plot

inv_logit()

Get inverse logit of a value

lh

Life history parameters for marine mammals.

logit()

Logit transform

make_ptable()

Make a performance table. Trajectories must be based on 100-year simulations.

multiplot_proj()

multiplot.proj

npr()

Calculate numbers per recruit

plot_bycatch_guesses()

Plot distribution of bycatch values

plot_pinnipeds()

Plot all the pinniped life history parameters

plot_proj()

Plot projections

plot_yield_curve()

Yield curve for Shiny

pop_vs_yield()

Yield or productivity curve

prob_rebuilt_goal()

Calculate the probability of reaching a rebuilding goal

projections()

Run simulations of a marine mammal population with bycatch mortality

rebuild_by_x()

Calculate the bycatch rate needed to reach a performance goal

run_app()

Run the Shiny Application
